findings.title: Deployer can transfer ownership
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to transfer ownership of the contract.

findings.title: Deployer can set market pair address and status
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set market pair addresses and their corresponding statuses.

findings.title: Deployer can include/exclude addresses from max transaction limit
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to include or exclude specific addresses from the maximum transaction limit, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can toggle wallet limit status
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to toggle the wallet limit status, which could lead to unauthorized changes to the contract's configuration.

findings.title: Deployer can include/exclude addresses from max wallet limit
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to include or exclude specific addresses from the maximum wallet limit, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can set wallet limit with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to set a wallet limit without any restrictions on the amount, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer can include/exclude addresses from fees
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to include or exclude specific addresses from fees, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can set buy taxes with an amount not greater than 30%
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to set buy taxes up to a maximum of 30%, which could lead to potential tax manipulation.

findings.title: Deployer Can Set Sell Taxes with an Amount Not Greater Than 30%
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set sell taxes with a maximum amount of 30%, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can set max transaction limit with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to set a maximum transaction limit without any restrictions on the amount.

findings.title: Deployer can set token limit before swap
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to set a token limit before performing a swap operation.

findings.title: Deployer can set team wallet address
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set the team wallet address, which may lead to unauthorized access or manipulation of funds.

findings.title: Deployer can toggle swap and liquify status
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to toggle swap and liquify status.

findings.title: Deployer can change router version address
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to modify the router version address, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The deployer does not have the ability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Deployer cannot block user
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to block a user.

findings.title: Deployer cannot lock contract
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to lock the contract.

findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.
